sentences.sentence: I have had fun changing my aura while taking an aura or Kirlian Photo.
sentences.translation: 在拍一张光环或基尔良照片的时候，我好玩改变了我的光环颜色。

sentences.sentence: The photographs shown here, produced using the Kirlian technique, were taken by American photographer Robert Buelteman.
sentences.translation: 这里出示的照片是美国摄影师——罗伯特·贝特曼(音译)用克里安技术制作的。
